text: main ( ) { int a [ 500005 ] , n , t , i , c ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { c = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < n - 1 ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] > a [ i + 1 ] ) { c = c + a [ i + 1 ] ; } else { c = c + a [ i ] ; a [ i + 1 ] = a [ i ] ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , c ) ; } return 0 ; }
